description.displayText: Abby cared for our first daughter from the time she was 6 weeks old until she was 7 months old, we would have continued our relationship but we moved out of the area.  Abby was always punctual and reliable care for our daughter, and anything that was asked of her, including light housekeeping, she did with a smile on her face.  Abby truly cared for our daughter and our daughter for her, which made us feel like she was in well cared for and good hands.  We would recommend Abby without hesitation and believe she would care for anyone's child with great thought and tenderness.
